text:
When running build.sh I get 

    [javac] /usr/local/tomcat4/jakarta-tomcat-4.0-b5-src/jasper/src/share/org/ap
ache/jasper/compiler/TagLibraryInfoImpl.java:611: Incompatible type for return.
Can't convert javax.servlet.jsp.tagext.ValidationMessage[] to java.lang.String.
    [javac]     return tlv.validate(getPrefixString(), getURI(), thePage);
    [javac]     ^
    [javac] 1 error

BUILD FAILED

/usr/local/tomcat4/jakarta-tomcat-4.0-b5-src/jasper/build.xml:59: Compile failed
, messages should have been provided.
creator: hi.tech@iol.it
remm@apache.org
text:
There has been changes in the JSP API, so it isn;t compatible with the (old) 
Tomcat 4.0 source.
To avoid these problems, you should try with Tomcat 4.0b6 and the latest 
version of the servlet / JSP API.
